name: Train Rush
description:
The theme for this year's Game Jam was "Stuck in a loop". Train Rush is a game where the player has to deliver supplies to different locations, running around loops and getting through obstacles.

Be careful, as your train's wagons number increases as your score gets higher!

The more deliveries completed  the faster the train becomes. The goal is for the player to deliver as many supplies as possible and overcome their personal high score.

The team:

- Panagiotis Iatrou [Programming]

- Akis Lionis [Programming]

- Stella Maladaki [Graphics]

- Apostolos Mexas [Music/SFX]
